item.title: In-App Navigation with Coordinators
item.description: Over the last years we have established best practices for writing android apps: clean architecture, architectural patterns like MVP, MVVM, MVI, Repository pattern and so on. But what about in-app navigation? In this blog post I would like to talk about the Coordinator pattern and how we could apply this pattern in android development to organize our in-app navigation code.
